client.models.menus 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : menus.py
@Author      : liuda
@Time        : 2022/2/26 10:57
@Description :
"""
from django.contrib.postgres.fields import ArrayField
from django.db import models

from client.models.base import BaseModel
from client.models.role import Platform, Role



[文档]class AppMenus(BaseModel):
    title = models.CharField(
        max_length=20,
        verbose_name="菜单标题"
    )
    code = models.CharField(
        max_length=20,
        verbose_name="菜单英文代码"
    )
    sort_num = models.IntegerField(
        verbose_name="菜单排序",
        default=1
    )
    icon = models.CharField(
        max_length=20,
        null=True,
        verbose_name="菜单图标英文名"
    )
    path = ArrayField(
        models.CharField(
            max_length=20,
            verbose_name="菜单英文代码"
        ),
        default=list,
        blank=True,
        verbose_name="权限节点路径"
    )
    url = models.CharField(
        max_length=255,
        verbose_name="菜单前端跳转路由"
    )
    is_deleted = models.BooleanField(
        default=False,
        verbose_name="是否被删除了"
    )
    platform = models.ForeignKey(
        Platform,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="所属平台"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "app_menus"
        verbose_name = "应用菜单"




[文档]class RoleAppMenus(BaseModel):
    role = models.ForeignKey(
        Role,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="角色ID"
    )
    app_menus = models.ForeignKey(
        AppMenus,
        on_delete=models.CASCADE,
        verbose_name="菜单权限"
    )

    class Meta:
        db_table = "role_app_menus"
        unique_together = [
            ["role", "app_menus"]
        ]
        verbose_name = "角色菜单表"
